alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Atchison and northwestern Holt Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 409 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shubert, or 14 miles north of Falls City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craig, Corning and Indian Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 89 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Missouri.
